DOC.brief_summary: In randomize control study design , n = 58 treatment patient depression conduct feedback-condition , therapist would receive feedback five time within 20 treatment session . The competence-feedback include detailed feedback 14 different aspect therapist behavior . The control group include n = 58 treatment within therapist receive competence-feedback ( treatment usual ; TAU ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Psychotherapeutic competency consider important factor therapy success . However , empirical study investigate competence-outcome relationship base correlational analysis . Therefore , study inappropriate investigation causal relationship . In previous study , feedback therapist ' competency find suitable enhance competency . Therefore , current research project , competence-feedback use enhance therapeutic competency systematically , order investigate causal impact competency therapy outcome . Using randomize control study design , n = 58 treatment patient depression conduct feedback-condition , therapist would receive feedback five time within 20 treatment session . The competence-feedback include detailed feedback 14 different aspect therapist behavior . The control group include n = 58 treatment within therapist receive competence-feedback ( treatment usual ; TAU ) . In order ensure comparability treatment condition ( regard observation situation ) , therapists TAU condition also receive feedback , treatment finish . We hypothesize feedback-group superior TAU-group treatment lead significantly good therapy outcome . Moreover , use mediator analysis analyze whether group-outcome relationship mediate therapeutic competency quality therapeutic alliance . The result highly relevant clinical process research , psychotherapy training dissemination treatment approach routine care .
DOC.criteria: THERAPISTS Having successfully complete interim Audit Having start treat ambulant patient PATIENTS Clinical diagnosis Major Depression ( Meeting DSMIV criterion ) Informed consent Suicidal tendency Clinical diagnosis alcohol drug addiction , acute schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder bipolar disorder Clinical diagnosis personality disorder cluster A ( odd disorder ) B ( dramatic , emotional erratic )
